```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,warning = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library("rvest")
library("tidyverse")
library("stringr")


read_webpg <- read_html("https://www.imdb.com/list/ls041125816/")
```



## Titre

```{r}
titre <- read_webpg %>%
         html_nodes(".lister-item-header")%>%
         html_text() %>%
         str_replace_all(.,"[:digit:]","")%>%
         str_replace_all(.,"\\\n","")%>%
         str_replace_all("[:blank:]","")%>%
         str_replace_all("[:punct:]","")


titre[17] <- '1917'
length(titre)
```



## Genre
```{r}
genre <- read_webpg %>%
         html_nodes(".genre")%>%
         html_text()%>%
         str_replace_all(.,"[\r\n]","")%>%
         str_replace_all(.,"\\s","")
      

length(genre)                     

```


## Score
```{r}
read_webpg %>%
  html_nodes("span.ipl-rating-star__rating")%>%
  html_text() -> rate


rate_nb <- rate[seq(1,length(rate),23)]

length(rate_nb)

```




## Directors 
```{r}

read_webpg %>%
  html_nodes('p.text-muted + a' )%>%
  html_text()

```

## Data frame

```{r}

df <- data.frame(titre = titre , genre = genre , score = rate_nb,stringsAsFactors = F)
row.names(df) <- NULL

```



```{r  ,fig.width=12}
df %>%
  arrange(desc(score))%>%
  top_n(20)%>%
  mutate(score = as.numeric(score),
         titre= fct_reorder(titre,score))%>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = titre , y = score , fill = as.factor(genre)))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
  theme_minimal()+
  coord_flip()+
  guides(fill = guide_legend( reverse = TRUE))+
  labs(fill = "Genre" , title = "Top 20 films en 2019 d'aprÃ¨s IMDB", caption = "Source IMDB")+
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 8))
```

```{r}
library(fishualize)

df %>%
  group_by(genre)%>%
  mutate(nb = n(),
        score = as.numeric(score))%>%
  filter(nb > 1 ) %>%
  summarise(avg_score = mean(score))%>%
  mutate(genre = fct_reorder(genre,avg_score))%>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = genre , y = avg_score,fill = genre))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
  scale_fill_fish_d(option = "Balistapus_undulatus")+
  coord_flip() +  guides(fill = guide_legend( reverse = TRUE))+
  theme(legend.position = "")+
  labs(y = "Average score" , x = "Genre" )

```
